spanGrp.span: I learnt this language at home.
But this language is not our language, it’s the Turkish dialect.
ama bu dıl dägıl bizım dıl bu dıldır dialekt turkčä dıl
but this language NOM.NEG 1.PL -GEN language this language -EPST.COP dialect:SG.M.NOM Turkish language
This language is very similar to the Turkish language.
bu dil turkčä dil dilä bänzer čoğ
this language Turkish language language -DAT look_like -IPFV very
We do not write in this language.
aa bu dilım yohtur yazmerıh biz bu dildä
HESIT this language -POSS.1.SG NEG.EXIST -EPST.COP write -NEG -1.PL 1.PL this language -LOC
At school I studied in Georgian language, but in this Urum language I spoke with grandmother when I was little.
bän školada ohudum gü gürjä bülerım gürjä ama bu dildä bu dil bu dildä bän söilerdım aa čüčük okiidım äbämdän äbämınän

1.SG school:SG.F.NOM -LOC teach -1.SG HESIT Georgian know -IPFV -1.SG Georgian but this language -LOC this language this language -LOC 1.SG speak -IPFV -PST -1.SG HESIT small when -PST.COP -1.SG grandmother -POSS.1.SG -ABL grandmother -POSS.1.SG -INSTR
Now when we go to the village, we do speak with our people in this language.
aa šindi oki kövä giderıh ordä söilierım bizım halhınan
HESIT now when village -DAT go -IPFV -1.PL there -LOC speak -IPFV -1.SG 1.PL -GEN people -INSTR
They speak in this Urum language even when they come to the village from Greece.
oki onnar gälerlär gretsiadan orda bu diljä söilerlär
when that -PL come -IPFV -PL Greece:SG.F.NOM -ABL there -LOC this language speak -IPFV -PL
